comment.author: Shannon
comment.text: Just voted in North Carolina for Trump today🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸

replies.author: Shannon
replies.text: Shane yay great ❤️ I got there at 12:57 before closing early voting and was done 3.5 hours later😜at least my boys behaved so well the whole time that it made it all worth it in the end🇺🇸🇺🇸 95 percent of tge people in my line at the end about 400-500 voted democrat. Wake county is democratic but hopefully the rest of the state will balance it. I would be too hopeful if he wins both FL and NC only because we voted😜😂xoxo🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸

replies.author: Shane
replies.text: Shannon , my experience was better, only 5 min :) and yes he will 🇺🇸
